column5: So im in Hamilton and I need to pick up a battery for my new minnkota today…..i need a 12V.  What should I buy…where….and what will it cost me?  Has anyone been thru the costing exercise here in Hamilton?
An Energizer at Wal-Mart should be a pretty good deal. Kirkland at Costco is ok too.
Acme Battery/Great Northern Battery on PArkdale...  get a deep cycle
Shop around and you should find one on sale.  Check your flyers or online.
If you want to make a trip to the toy store BPS, their deep cycle batteries are excellent. I am on year 3 with mine and it still holds a good charge and runs my Minnkota for hours on end.
